Articles.Content:
I have contributed to the IYSS with the Slingshot Relay, it uses 2 engines to slingshot anything to any destination, including probes, kerbals and micro ships.

The Link is mega.co.nz, and here is the installation instructions.

1st: Extract the folder onto your desktop

2nd: Open windows explorer to your KSP installation folder

3rd: open the folder

4th: navigate to your save

5th: drag the.craft file to your saves Ships folder.

and finally lucky number 6, have fun.

feel free to add it to your space station too!

link: https://mega.co.nz/#!5dJSFCYJ!w7s4VYIsT68Dg4-yjhFcPmKVfSBBtcCs6YSdip2Ih0c
Umm this project is some 2 years old and only famous KSP Youtubers contributed. And the SLingshot aka Mass Relay wasn't made by yo, it was made by Danny2462 who even made a video of it
please don't necro year old threads

Oh god you're right... it is a year old..

 

Whatever. I'll stop talking.
